subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4565 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

I ordered this product 8 days ago. How come the tracking information shows the product has been returned? And is no longer in transit?

Thank you
Kaine

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaine Johnson,  I am sorry for it. We have reshipped it to you. Here is your new UPS tracking number: 1ZJ455510408210118. You can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.
